virtual-sensor.name: Thur_DozerDecagonMux_pos5_chart1
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerDecagonMuxMsg) information from Thur deployment

address.predicate: select GENERATIONTIME, PAYLOAD_DATA_CONDUCTIVITY0, PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID0, PAYLOAD_DATA_CONDUCTIVITY1, PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID1, PAYLOAD_DATA_CONDUCTIVITY2, PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID2, PAYLOAD_DATA_CONDUCTIVITY3, PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID3, PAYLOAD_DATA_CONDUCTIVITY4, PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID4 from Thur_DozerDecagonMux_mapped_1396 where POSITION = 5 and PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID = 1

source.query: select GENERATIONTIME, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID0 = 0, NULL, PAYLOAD_DATA_CONDUCTIVITY0 / 50) as C0, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID1 = 0, NULL, PAYLOAD_DATA_CONDUCTIVITY1 / 50) as C1, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID2 = 0, NULL, PAYLOAD_DATA_CONDUCTIVITY2 / 50) as C2, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID3 = 0, NULL, PAYLOAD_DATA_CONDUCTIVITY3 / 50) as C3, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID4 = 0, NULL, PAYLOAD_DATA_CONDUCTIVITY4 / 50) as C4 from wrapper
